                                 TimeUnit unit)

Description copied from class: BaseComputeDriver
Called after service has uninstalled. Used to implement cloud resource cleanup for this service.

Overrides:
onServiceUninstalled in class BaseComputeDriver
Parameters:
duration - time to wait for the shutdown operation.
unit - time unit for the shutdown operations
Throws:
InterruptedException - If the operation was interrupted.
TimeoutException - If the operation exceeded the given timeout.
CloudProvisioningException - If the operation encountered an error.

handleServerCredentials

protected void handleServerCredentials(org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails machineDetails,
                                       ComputeTemplate template)
                                throws CloudProvisioningException
Handles credentials for accessing the server - in this order: 1. pem file (set as a key file on the user block in the groovy file) 2. machine's remote password (set previously by the cloud driver)

Parameters:
machineDetails - The MachineDetails object that represents this server
template - the cloud template.
Throws:
CloudProvisioningException - Indicates missing credentials or IOException (when a key file is used)

Parameters:
eventName - The name of the event (must be in the message bundle)
args - Arguments that complement the event message
